name: Gameu911 Gameutoo
text: I would not recommend any other U-Haul in Montgomery. These people were nice courteous and fair upon me choosing the vehicle that I wanted. The vehicle was also clean on the inside as you can check the videos to see. The items that they sell here are not overpriced and fairly priced. Highly recommended if you're going to use a U-Haul you need to use this one. And the storage facilities are $50 per month you can't beat that. They are also setting up an inside storage as well.

name: FreeThe People
text:
Zero star. Worst company ever. Didnt have my truck or trailer ready. Didnt have the pock up I ordered  (20 mpg )
Gave me a box truck I didnt want ( 10 mpg ) sent me too 3 other locations for the tow dolly. A 188 dollar bill turned into 265. Customer svc siad it's not thier fault. I knew what i was getting on too. Spent 3 hrs on hold and got hung up on several times.
Dont ever use uhaul. Go enterprise.
Big middle finger you haul. I hope they go bankrupt.

name: James Bentley
text: They provide exactly what they say they'll provide, good job

name: Anjanette Johnson
text: Always a pleasure doing business with them!

name: Stefon Smith
text: Easy to work with got done what I needed.

name: Mike S
text: Plenty of available units

name: David Steiner
text: Not helpful

name: Walker B
text: Went to pick a truck that we rented for 24hrs lady ran out and said we only only rented it for the night and had to have back by 9:AM. After calling UHaul during the phone call we told we rented it for 6 hrs.  8 , hrs , 10, hours everybody we talked to blamed the computer but had a different  story. Moral of the story don't rent from uhaul. But the woman at this dealership  had very little  customer service  skills was zero help. The customer is supposed to be helped. She just matter of fact said she couldn't help us.  Didn't offer to call uhaul . Didn't offer to help the situation.   I have used this business for 4 different  moves and have referred  several people to it. But that ends today.

name: Jaime Mcfall
text: Worst customer service I've ever experienced.  Vehicle that was reserved was not available and no alternatives were presented as options.   The customer service representative at the location was also completely unaware and dismissive of the $50 reservation guarantee that is all over the reservation website.  Again,  easily the worst experience I have ever had.

name: Carolyn Hastings
text: I wouldn’t do business with this location if it was the only one around.  As it is, I have lots of choices.  Never have I encountered such a rude, even hostile, person in a customer service position.  If this is how it is beforeI have my business, imagine how it would be after I’m committed.

name: Chris Parsons
text: Great, friendly service for over 2 years now.

name: Laura Roberson
text: Part of the S and S storage and Climate Control business. My son rented one to help him move. Truck was clean and well maintained.

name: Shain Rufus
text: Don't bother. We scheduled ahead of time online to reserve a uhaul truck. Picked it up and the vehicle was dead...likely dead battery. Called uhaul and was on hold for 30 minutes and then they transferred me to Roadside assistance. On hold there for an hour and the operator hung up on me by mistake (I'm assuming)...and did not call me back. So was on the phone another house just to cancel it. Pathetic. I've used u-haul twice in my life and both times have been a terrible experience. Use another company and save time! If I could give zero stars I would...

name: Bo Roberson
text: Jerry was FANTASTIC !!!! They took care of me and even made sure truck was ready to go. Very polite, helpful and professional. Down to earth good people here DEFINITELY RECCOMEND DOING BUSINESS HERE !!!!!

name: HUGO EDUARDO VEGA RODRIGUEZ
text: Arrived 40 mins before closing but the salesman told me “I can’t rent you anything right now, I have to be somewhere else” and shut the door. I will never come back, this place has no respect for customers.

name: Jason Shaw
text: Got sent there to return a truck on Sunday because there supposed to be open ,and after sitting there for 30 minutes could not get any uhaul dealer in Jasper to help me return the truck do not trust them with your bank cards. They were not open

name: Matt Nielson
text: To say that Sam is the best would be putting it lightly. He helped me on a Sunday after the office was closed with a trailer/car issue and went out of his way to make it easy for me. Highly suggest working with him.

name: Tina Polk
text: They don't know how to work on a computer they accuse u of hitting something when u don't they try to charge u more than they should. Trucks r dirty an smell funky. Do not use secondhand Sams for ur uhaul service.

name: Amy Smith-Realtor
text: Easy pick up and drop off. Great people to work with. Thank you.

name: Roberto Cuervo
text: This is the best customer service i ever have, Sam and his guys are very helpful, highly recommended

name: Charlotte Halcomb
text: Love the customer service and the second hand store at location is amazing.

name: Steve Edwards
text: Good prices

name: Nichole “Redneck Physco” Mauger-Mallett
text: Pricy

name: Mark Cook
text: These people are awful!!  Service is awful, emoyees are discourtious, equipment is not maintained and they try not to refund money they overcharge you.   Find another source, this business is obviously in deep trouble and the lack of maintenance on the rental equipment is going to cause someone serious problems.

name: Jeremy Hughes
text:
Worst experience I have ever had at a rental place . We reserved a 20 ft truck 2 weeks in advance to move my daughter to North Carolina for medical school .
I was quoted $395.00 total for the weekend to return it sunday . I show up to pick the truck up at 6 pm on friday and the tell me it's going to be $1236.00 . They said the lady that made my reservation messed up , so I didnt have the money to get it and it was too late to go somewhere else , so it ruined our plans and our schedule . I will never go back here ever and you cant get ahold of anybody to complain .

name: Nilesha Givens
text: The Manger Antonio is the exact opposite of what the sales department displays the mission and goals the Sales Department portray when renting any service from this unit.   Last year when I rented a truck and unit online the sales department split the sale; I pick up the truck from 1420 Montgomery Hwy facility and the unit sold to me was this facility.  After, moving my son home from Alabama State University, tired and weary, I decided to go to the unit first to unload his items from college.  It was so many people there and every time a customer complained (People of color) the employees would say, “He is not available.”  Looking out of the window I noticed a white man running up to the U-Haul vehicle we rented from a half a mile away approach my son sitting in the U-Haul Van yelling, screaming at him, "Is that my truck?”  I got out of the long line and approach the man and asked him why he was screaming at my son (It was Antonio the manger) and he said, I am the manger looking for one of my vehicles.  Meanwhile a neighbor of mine was moving and demanding to speak with because the U-Haul she rented broke down on the side of the road after leaving the facility and she was told he was unavailable; she was black too.  Antonio put a lock on my storage never notifying me because he said it was the wrong lock and I purchased it from his facility.  I do not have key, nor have he reached out to me.  Calls to the facility always goes into the sales department because the staff is always unavailable.  People of color never rent anything from this facility that is why his employee turn over rate is so high!

name: betty webb
text: Wish I could have stored my things at this one so nice and professional....😳🥺but had to use the other one across from the bowling alley. Not professional at all.

name: Christian Hunter
text: Best moving services!!! If you are looking for affordable moving services then go for U-Haul Moving & Storage of Vestavia.

name: Jose Conchello
text: Called a few weeks ahead to get a wiring harness installed.  Arrived at my appointment time only to find out that they don't have mechanics scheduled to come in for another 2 hours. You would think that a nation-wide enterprise would have figure out how a scheduling system works by this day in age. Serious waste of my personal time due to company negligence.

name: Drew Templeton
text: Joshua was a huge help. The rental process was smooth and I ended up being really glad I got the $8 insurance add-on 😬😅. Will definitely be back.

name: Eric Bowden
text: This location excels in customer service and should be a model for all U-HAUL locations. Being in the customer service industry myself, I know first hand what excellent customer service should look like. Every single person at this location work in excellence every day. GREAT JOB!  We appreciate you and we will definitely be back!!

name: Chris Williams
text: Can’t even bother to answer their phone. I was on hold for an hour and no answer. Yes it was during business hours. Pitiful service. Won’t be using y’all

name: Katherine Barhydt
text: We specifically ordered a 15ft truck over 3 weeks in advance and they tried to “upgrade” us to a 26ft. Neither of us have ever driven something that size and made it clear we were extremely uncomfortable especially driving that size in downtown Houston traffic. How do you consider that an upgrade? If I ordered a Medium sweater and got a XXL it would be reasonable to be upset. No one would help us, they let other people in line behind us interrupt while we were trying to sort the mess they made out. We called 5 times over Friday and Saturday to confirm our truck and it’s size. I could not be more disappointed in their customer service, the ethics of this company, and their willingness to honor the contracts they make with their customers.

name: T. Lee Baumann
text: I can see why this establishment is not listed on Angie's List, HomeAdvisors, or has a Better Business Bureau affiliation. After driving in from out of town to get a hitch installed on my car, and having confirmed that the parts were in, several days in advance, when I arrived for my reservation, I was told the parts were NOT in! When asked how that could be, after verifying the parts several days beforehand, I was told their employees were trained to say "yes." My biggest disappointment was the absence of any apologies whatsoever. I was then promised I would be contacted AS SOON as the parts did arrive. That never happened. I had to call the corporate office the day before my rescheduled reservation (on a holiday weekend, of course) to finally verify that the parts had arrived. This is the type of service you should expect should you choose to do business at this location.

name: Dan Little
text: Good service, clean and convenient

name: Chuck Turner
text:
Had a great experience
Eric white is a great asset to uhaul.  Great skill sets and very thorough in the transaction

name: nick
text: Been in store twice and had no one at counter for several mins both times. If u need free stuff you most likely could go in and out without ever being noticed

name: Chato Denaris
text: .today after a 20  mile detour the two young punks , feed me a " my manager line " because it was to hard for them to open a gas line .pitiful😡

name: Kevin Morson
text: U-Haul on 31 has the worst customer service I've ever experienced. I walk into the store and can't find anybody. So I walk around back to see if I can find someone. When I finally do I say "oh good there is someone here, I need to get a propane tank filled". He jumps down my throat and tells me "they're busy hooking up trailers". I say "there's no need to be rude", afterward he turns and walks away from me. This is not the first time I've had issue with U-Haul but it will be the last I'm done with them.

name: Justin Rogers
text: Nice facility and quick service. It's best if you call ahead to make sure that the size truck you want is there for you. Also, make sure you know the relative distance you are traveling, and save your receipt from when you fill up just in case there are any problems.

name: Sandra Cox
text: The assistant manager was so helpful. I was running late and he waited for me to get propane. He went above and beyond and I am very grateful.

name: Jonathan Ary
text:
I would not recommend  this Uhaul location to anyone for anything.  I detailed my experience with them below.....

2015:  I took my vehicle to them to have a trailer hitch installed.  I scheduled an appointment and dropped my vehicle off at 7:00 am on my way to work and was assured that it would be completed by 4:00 pm when I came back.  It was almost 7:00 pm before they were complete, so I sat there for 3 hours waiting.  When they were complete they told me that I would need to come back and get a ball for the hitch since they didn't have an that fit the hitch in stock.  This defeated the purpose of needing a hitch before the weekend, but I borrowed a ball from a neighbor.  When I hooked the trailer up, I noticed the lights were not coming on. Something was wrong with the electrical.

3 days later I called and they said to come in and pick up the ball.  When I arrived they said that they were mistaken and did not have one.  I mentioned that the electrical was faulty, but they could not look at it that day since the trailer hitch guy was not there.

1 month later I called(they never called me back) and was told they had a ball that fit and I picked it up.  Once again, they said no one was there to look at my electrical issue.

A few months later I called to make an appointment to have the hitch fixed.  Their phone disconnected me three times and I gave up after wasting 30 minutes on hold.

When I go by the location and finally make an appointment, i'm told it will cost me upwards of $100 to have it repaired since it only had a 30 day warranty.  They said there was no record of me having ever mentioned the issue before.

Overall, this location has awful customer service.  More should have been done to fix my issues instead of kicking the can down the road until they could say it was out of warranty.

name: Y S
text:
How do they hire people with such bad customer service. The two guys working there on Sunday afternoon both times I have gone (back in December) and then today) make up whatever excuse and have the ugliest attitude. Give them some lessons on body language and customer service.

Please avoid this location at all cost! Go to Pelham, super friendly and helpful there.

name: VERONICA ROSAS
text: Exelente service Mr. Antonio always take care me with everything I need I come to that place 1 time a week to tent a truck or refill my propane tank

name: helishengduowen
text: Antonio is the best moving planner you can get, and the even better part is he doesn't charge!

name: JK Dufour
text:
I got a wiring done for a trailer hitch and it took them over 3 hours to install. In the process of the installation they broke my brake light wiring and failed to say anything to me after, then when I was pulled over I came back and asked them about it, they denied having broken it and said it was there before. I asked them to fix it and it took them 2 hours to even start on it and after 3 total hours they said they can’t find anything wrong and they tried to charge me for labor.
They also overcharged me for a 5x8 trailer that I brought back a day early.
This place has some of the most incompetent customer service of any U-haul.

name: J T
text: Not a bad experience but the wait can be long. Check in ahead of time online, it makes a huge difference. The staff was fast and friendly once I got moving. I would use this location again.

name: Evan Harsh
text:
Do not believe anything they quote you over the phone. Sounds like the employees are just guessing.

I spoke to the GM Anthonio C. and only got excuses. No apologies were given and no amends for the hassle I was put through were offered. The only thing he was willing to do was refund me for an appliance dolly that was not given to me.

Unless there's no other option I will never use Uhaul again.

Zero customer service skills across the board.

name: Tiffany Chapman
text: I have some questions about something and the young guy there was very nice and he was very informative and he gave me printouts of prices of the item I needed and the staff was overall

name: Payton Sellers
text: By far and away the worst interaction with any business I have ever had (comcast and other communications providers included). I experienced double billings, over billings, misrepresentation, late services, failure to come through on services offered. Surely, uhaul must be a capable organization, however the people within this store simply misrepresent their capabilities as to when services will be available, times they will be available, etc. I arrived at the store after calling 3 times (once the day prior and twice earlier that day) to verify that the services I needed were ready - and they were not, an no one seemed to care. the My issue was escalated to the regional manager and even he failed to call return my call. Don't take this risk with people who will be storing and moving your things. Avoid at all costs :(

name: Josh May
text:
Edit: My review below was based on my last 4 or 5 visits and still stands. While it took me another 2 visits and 15-20 minutes of wait time today to get my tank filled, the associate did recognize the situation and gave me a discount on the propane. Bumping from 1 to 2 stars.

Getting propane here is like pulling teeth. You can ring the bell all you want, but you just get ignored. Associates walk past and don't say anything. Going inside and asking just nets you excuses ("broken machine", "don't have anyone who can do that right now", etc.). I get that the trucks are the money makers, but if you offer a service, have a plan for it. Set specific propane hours, train your maintenance crews on how to use the machine, or something else.

name: Cody Hamilton
text: UHual and Walmart have equivalent customer service and that’s why I don’t shop at Walmart and I just bought my own trailer so I don’t have to deal with either now.

name: Little Bird
text: Booked reservation for 6x12 trailer several weeks out. Had "Guaranteed Reservation". Checked inventory on site, looked good. Day before moving daughter to college at 4:09 PM, receive text my reservation has been moved to Location 30+ miles away.  Called location where I had reservation and was told, "It's corporate. I can't do anything about it. You need to call 800-GOUHAUL if you're not happy."  Called 800# multiple times on the way to Vestavia location alternating calls to Pell City as I was afraid of driving 31 miles without assurance of equipment.  No answer in Pell City. 800 number would pick up and then drop me over and over. At store, no help. In front of me for 30 minutes, people with same story. Behind me...a dozen more people with same story as me. At counter poor kid making apologies and telling how bad U-Haul has become. Don't use U-Haul unless you're willing to gamble on your move day. I would give them no stars if it would let me. Expect to see them folding up shop any day now. No way a corporation can operate this way.

name: Kristen
text: Some if the workers could be a bit nicer but they had what we needed.

name: Rus Hardy
text: Read your paperwork closely!  What they quote isn't what you get.

name: Ashlee Boren Myers
text: After our pick up time was pushed back from 12 to 3pm, we were told they had no truck there for us. Despite the fact I had called to confirm. We were then redirected to the store on Valley avenue. The man at the desk seemed more irritated with the situation than I was and did not apologize once for the situation.

name: Gary Grimes
text: Convenient trailer rentals with wide selection

name: Eric
text: Always rent from these guys when I need a basic trailer.... never had a problem.

name: Joseph Duran
text: Friendly and quick, that's all I need any place to be.

name: Joseph Williams
text: A hole in the roof of the truck was hidden by the open rear door. Found the hole when we were loading the truck and notified the General Manager and he stuck me with the bill for repair because as he repeatedly stated insistently: "We do not ship trucks with holes". Despite the hole being obviously either cutout or rusted out due to poor maintenance/inspections and in a location that is impossible to see unless the door is almost completely lowered or the door is closed with someone inside. 0/10 Experience and will not be using UHAUL again especially the UHAUL in Vestavia.

name: walt stricklin
text: good people, great experience every time I use this location!!

name: Andrew Parrott
text: Great service, willing to work with all moving needs.

name: Nikkia Smith
text: In and out with great customer service! My new uhaul home!

name: Chris Freeman
text: Convenient location, but they're way too busy for the amount of staff they have.  Expect long waits

name: Christopher Peters
text: Friendly staff, made renting the truck easy.

name: alston1028
text: I've always had a good experience there, from getting propane to renting a trailer.

name: Daniel Seay
text: Decent. A bit of a wait during visit due to lack of staff.

name: J Ranieri
text: Slow service. Not sure if it is the technology or the people.

name: Amreen Ali
text: Very good store.

name: Tom Millard
text: Huge selection of trucks, trailers, etc. Waits can be bad though.

name: Kristi Martin
text: Managers are helpful and awesome.

name: Brian Cupps
text: 20 minute wait and my reservation wasn't available.

name: Matthew Montz
text: Went for propane.  Waited outside 20 minutes and left empty.  Obviously selling propane is not much of a priority here.

name: John Robertson
text: Service ok

name: Daniel Crosby
text: Done with U-Haul

name: Jeannie Johnson
text: Friendly

name: Chance Lesser
text: Very helpful people

name: Tonja Hooper
text: Available when I needed it

name: Joseph Townsend
text:
When one of the guys are working there's never any propane, others working you have no problem, call to see whom is working prior to driving to the Beltline location seems one guy don't like selling propane. January 16th 2021
You will get a lecture from one young man about "Safe travel with propane tank" ( Not needed) no charge for their sour attitudes. Clay will get your propane, the others not so much.

name: Ink Guy
text: Just wonderful booked online made a 7am appointment done by 8:30 . Over and be on satisfied!!, shouting out to CLAY for taking care of it fast and efficiently. Thank you Clay and U-Haul for making my experience fast and painless , thank you all again God Bless.

name: Rodney Jones
text: Terrible interaction by their employee.  Needed to refill propane tank and pulled over to the Propane fill station and waited.  There were no other customers only the lone employee.  After waiting, I went to the office building (door standing open) to get the employees attention that I needed propane refill.  He told me to step outside and he would be with me in a minute.  So I wait out by my car.   When he finally came out he began to lecture about masks and insisted that I put one on while standing out in the parking lot.  What a joke.  CNN has brainwashed this joker.  Won’t ever be back

name: Kenzie Barnett
text: We stopped in with a last minute request on our way out of town and the manager, Clay, helped us out big time! The problem we ended up having wasn’t even on uhaul’s end and Clay still helped us fix the problem. Thank you for going above and beyond!

name: Graham Johnson
text: Fast and easy.

name: Daniel Buerger
text: Dont need a lecture about masks.  Dont need to be treated like I am 6.   Wont be back.  Keep your b.s. pandemic fears for your own phycosis.

name: Mark Childers
text: Nice how you treat retired military!

name: Mark Eriquezzo
text: So let me start by saying I am reviewing for two experiences here at this Uhaul location. The first time when I moved to this area I dropped off my UHaul equipment here and a middle aged Army Veteran greeted me and helped with the process of the return. He also helped me to figure out the area and gave me some local information which was very helpful. Now when I moved from this area I picked up my UHaul from Quality Used Automotive and I would not recommend picking up from that location but I had to unfortunately and the UHaul equipment dolly and pads were not in the truck and it was incredibly dirty. So I took the truck and drove only 4 minutes back to this initial UHaul location where I had another amazing experience. The General Manager, Clay Reed JR, met me in the store and I told him what was going on. He helped me get a dolly and pads as well as offered to clean my truck for me free of charge. His kindness, professionalism, and overall customer care is the entire reason UHaul still has my business. So to you Clay again I say THANK YOU SIR! 🙏🏻

name: Jason Morris
text: Good customer service from clay employee

name: Dale Terrell
text: The manager really worked to help me, was very professional and hard working. I think his name was clay, either way I recommend them to everyone.

name: Dodd Bouchillon
text: Everyone needs to avoid doing business wit this location.  Called them to see if they had propane after the other store was out.  Woman that answered the phone stated that they did and I headed across town to their location.  When I got there, the guy behind the counter quickly told me that they could not pump any propane because their system was acting up.  Why did the woman on the phone not know this and save me a trip.  Really poor customer service.

name: David Obert
text: Don't waste your time I drove up there and the lady was too  lazy To do any work and was very rude Will be Latin everyone I can know not to do business there wasted my time

name: Mark Thomason
text: There is rarely an associate on duty who is certified to operate the propane tank filling station. I have worked next to this store for 13 years and this has been the case for a very long time. This store is apparently poorly managed because they are missing out on a lot of business just because they simply won't train their associates. It is a shame I have to drive across town when this store is so conveniently located to me.

name: Gunnar Patterson
text: Terrible place to do any business! Dont expect the same answrr twice, or anyone to ever answer the phone, they lie, and over charge, they do not know their own inventory or how things are supposed to check out. Then they call an harass you claiming you never turned the rental in and try to charge you outrageous amounts. Stay away from this location.

name: Ashlie Long
text:
Horrible customer service. Everytime I dealt with these people on the phone they were extremely rude with little to no customer service. Even on the reservation phone line, the lady I spoke with was snarky and rude.
Never booking with uhaul ever again.

name: Deborah Herron
text: Nice people!

name: J B
text: Very busy location, and understaffed.

name: Brandon Strickland
text: Nobody on staff to fill propane.

name: Victoria Williams
text: This place is inside a gas station but the guys who helped me were amazing! They were friendly and I was grateful they had what I needed. Thanks guys!!#

name: Shanda Frost
text: They were located in a gas station but they were very professional very considerate very very friendly helped me in anyway they could and they very very sweet and kind and awesome customer service went the extra mile to help me find what I needed u can’t find another deal ship better than this one I 100% recomend this place

name: Joe Kilpatrick
text: This U-Haul is placed at the gas station, I was their first customer and they handled it greatly I believe they're probably doing much better now!

name: Kathryn Sharp
text: They are very helpful.  The manager of this location is a real peach...they don't make them any better.

name: Chris Shears
text: Every time I call I can not give an answer... Need to take that number down and get working number up

name: MaryAnn Green
text: Employeesverre quite helpful in helping me rent a storage unit.

name: Stephen Wisener

It's extremely disrespectful to treat customers like trash the way they did. The employees there almost always are just hanging out together not doing their jobs and when I arrive for service, I have to wait about 10 minutes just to ask a few questions when they aren't even doing anything in the first place. To the employees working there, you will be seeing me very soon and I will show you what it's like to be treated the way you treated my family.

name: Cindy Benson
text: After reading the reviews, I must admit, I was a little hesitant about picking up a 26' truck for our one way move to Birmingham from Frank's Place but they were one of the few open on Sunday.  We ended up renting the truck on Saturday.  I have to say these people couldn't have been any nicer.  Seth and Jason both helped us.  Seth helped us up to the point where the 2 UHaul gift cards we wanted to use could not go through on  the website so Jason had to call UHaul to get those kind folks to enter them.  After that we were on our way.  The truck was clean and seems to run fine.  We haven't left for B'ham yet but so far we are very pleased and happy we chose UHaul and Frank's Place.  THANK YOU!!

name: Wayne Compton
text: My wife went to pick up a trailer. They two men never offered to help hook the trailer or check the lights. They simply told her it’s out back and look for this number. One never looked up from his phone.

name: Joe Kirsch
text:
Beware the crazy lady next door! DO NOT DRIVE THROUGH HER PROPERTY TO GET YOUR U-HAUL. She will go ham on you and attempt to make your day miserable just for driving on her gravel! I'm so sorry that Franks is next to this woman.

Franks is surrounded by a big red metal fence, this is where you need to go in order to rent a U-Haul. He is very polite and even helped me understand what would be more cost effective in my move, and, even gave me suggestions on how to move better. Everywhere else in town just throws you in to a truck and that's it. Will definitely rent another U-Haul from Frank in the future (probably end up buying my first pistol from here, too!)

name: Tony Weaver
text: These guys are great. Rented several times and always easy to deal with.

text: Very nice people I will use them again

text: Super quick and easy

name: Krista Bell
text: The employee we saw at pickup was very nice. Per our contract, we rented the uhaul from 5:30pm to 8:30pm, but this kind employee told us we could turn it in before opening the next day (7am). We returned at 6:45am, and Sabrina was very rude and charged us for 2 days. (We only had the uhaul for 12 hours.) When I explained the situation, she just kept stating to “read the contract”. I’m aware of what the contract said as I made the reservation, but when an employee tells me differently, I take their word. Very disappointed.

name: Sarah Adkins-Jablonsky
text:
This is the first one star review I’ve ever given.

Uhaul cancelled without our notice and did not care, leaving us in the cold

We rented a 15 ft truck weeks before a cross city move from this Vestavia location. The day before, we got a call saying the pick up location was at True Value in Helena AL. When we get there, the True Value reps said it was not available due to a mishap with another customer and to call to find a location where we could pick up our truck. When we called the Vestavia store to find out truck, they said our reservation had been cancelled. When? By whom? They could not tell us (????) but said there was a cancellation email (but we never received an email— our emails only tell us to go to TrueValue). So we are left without a truck and without an apology.

When we try to make a new reservation, the closest option was a 30ft truck a 3 hour round trip away.

U-Haul permanently lost a customer.

name: Louis Gobeo
text: Outstanding service. The day I visited, the manager was working through an issue with their alarm. Despite what was surely a stressful situation, she provided prompt and courteous service and bent over backwards to help us out with our rental. I cannot recommend this place enough. Thank you!

name: Bill Pesnell
text: I have rented from this location numerous times. Without fail, and consistent on each and very rental, the manager Sabrena, and the staff have been polite, extremely helpful, open to suggestions, and overall, a joy with which to work. Not once have I ever had an issue. I would recommend that potential new customers overlook the one-off bad review because everyone has a bad day now and then. Big picture, Sabrena and the crew will bend over backwards to help any way they can. I will not rent from any other vendor or location if at all possible. Five Star service without a doubt.

name: Corey
text: Friendly service and was everything i needed! Will only rent from this location in the future! Top notch business!

Sabrina came out to our truck while we were unloading into our storage to do the paperwork to return the truck. She saw that we had our baby with us and wanted to help us get out of there faster! Would recommend to everyone!

name: Lindsay Baird
text: Sabrena is a wonderful manager who makes certain that her store operates efficiently and professionally. Everyone there has been courteous and helpful. We had a great experience. Will definitely do business with them in the future... Highly recommend!

text: General Manager Sabrina  is rude, mean and disrespectful! She loves to hang up on customers, and over charge them. Don’t do business with her ever. Just plain nasty. She uses her authority in the wrong way manner. Not fit to manage anyone!!

name: cece tarver
text: The worker Paul  at this location lied about a free month when he overheard me and my sister talking about taking our things to another storage facility because they have a 1 month free promotion and he says so do we now fast forward a month later and I have late fees and liens in my property because he lied. You can never get anyone on the phone no matter what time of day it is. Also I have called corporate several times spoke with someone named David Reed who was very short and nasty because he kept saying you have to call the store and speak with them when I explained that no one is on the office when I get off at 6. Even though I was told they are there until 7. So I was told on Thursday that he would call me back by 1:00 that day to discuss this (remind you this is the guy who lied to me.) Still haven't spoke with the manager at this facility and I thinks it's because they know they messed up. So for 3 weeks I have been given the run around and still no district manager or nothing. I will say this how ever it turn out from thus point I WILL NOT NOR WILL I RECOMMEND THIS UHAUL COMPANY TO ANYONE! Now the lie is it's only if you are moving one way (BUT WHO MOVES OUT OF STATE AND PUT THERE THINGS IN A STORAGE IT MAKES NO DENSE AT ALL!!!!!) Save your time and money and go to another place. The manager at the location up the street is worse his name is Antonio. Don't know why any of these people got into customer service cause clearly they are not cut out for this job. They say you pay for what you get so buyer beware this is what I got lesson learned that's for sure!!!!!!!

I hope her boss realizes what an awesome employee she is and rewards her accordingly. Having been a business owner myaelf, I realize how difficult great employees are to come by. name: raymond lapointe
text: Booked rental on 6/19/21. Booked through u haul website for 1300 P/u. Site stated location was open till 1430. Got there to pick up truck and location had been closed since 1200. I called uhaul and got the runaround for over an hour. Then finally talked with the local agent for uhaul. Was informed nearest truck of same size was 60 miles away and would have to pay for all mileages still. So would have had to pay 120 dollars worth of mile, plus fuel. Because I had to return truck to pickup location stated by agent. For a move of 30 miles round trip. Slapout hardware needs to correct their website info and hours of service.

name: J. Patrick Smith
text: Best place for U-Haul rentals in Slapout.

name: MARY GOMES
text: I luckily walked in at the right time because this facility is popular and was booked up but I was able to get a 5x10 that fit my needs perfectly. The staff was extremely helpful making sure I had full access on moving items in on a stressful day. I utilized the month needed and made sure I cleared everything out. Turning in my access card was quick and easy while staff did check to make sure nothing was left.

name: Nesse Nichols
text: Manager was nice and informative. But I didn't like how he tried to give me misinformation.  Told me if I brought it back after hours I would be charged a $20 fee. But on the site it said if I checked it back in on the mobile site, it was no charge, if I checked in with a rep, it would be a charge. I challenged his wording and started to show the site and email then he adjusted his words. I've done this a few times so I know the routine.

name: Robbie Forbes
text:
Hours said open at 9 am on Sunday. We arrived before 9 am and stayed till 9:15 am where no phone calls were answered, no knocks on the door were heard, and probably nobody was there while my family and 2 others cars were waiting outside.
Was not well received professionally.
We cut our loses with this U-haul facilities staff, unhitched the trailer, and left it in their parking lot.
I suggest you do the same if you encounter a similar situation with them.

Reattempted to call the office again at 9:28 to notify we left the trailer, but still no answer.

name: Richard Daniels
text: Rob answered all my questions. Helped me with equipment options and was very courteous.

text: Great customer service. I was pleased from the time I walked through the door and the transaction.

text: The U-Haul service/courtesy/professionalism of the owner at this location (Rob?) is absolutely fantastic. There are several locations nearer to me but I'd go back to this one in a heartbeat. I've never used the storage so I can't rate that.

text: I returned a truck & tow to this location after moving from another state. First, I received a text directing me to another Uhaul location on Sparkman. However, while enroute, I received a second text redirecting me to this location. Rob was awesome! He was friendly, professional & quick. I really appreciate the great customer service I received today. If I'm in need of such services again, I will go this location if possible because Rob is on point! Thanks again!

name: Nikee Smith
text: This place use to be very good to rent storage and uhaul trucks from. I’ve had storage with them for over 8 years. It is under new ownership with Joe and Carolyn Davenport. Joe Davenport has no customer service skills what’s so ever. I rented a Uhaul truck from them and when I opened the truck, it was full of adult and baby roaches. I was in a time constraint with moving so we killed them and kept going. The more we loaded the truck the more roaches came out. I shared the information with Joe Davenport when returning the truck in which his response was “Did you bring the roaches with you?” and “People in Alabama have roaches all the time!”. This response was so unprofessional in which he continued to make smart unprofessional remarks without providing a solution.  I gave them one star so that I could leave a review, they deserve no stars do not waste your money here. Do better Davenport’s!!! Be professional with your customers!!!

I knew right then that I did not want to do business with these people.
